name: The Angel's Heir
description:
All Hail Prince Lavandin .

A demo for a fantasy dating sim that takes place in the high and faraway castle of Wardhollow.

You are hired as the Crown Prince's personal knight, with little to no knowledge of what challenges lie ahead. Luckily, the castle is full of friendly - and not so friendly - strangers that may just have the information you desire. That is, if you're willing to get to know them.
